attributes.action: Ban Fracking In The U.K - NOW
attributes.additional_details:
Hydraulic Fracturing or "Fracking" is a deeply unpopular policy that harms the environment, causes permanent damage and finally does not alleviate our reliance on Fossil Fuels...

You, I & the people, call on the Government to review the "go ahead" on Fracking and ban it just like in France or Bulgaria.

To add insult to injury, TOTAL - a French company, is firmly rooted to destroying our land because they can't to theirs.

Please see sense Mr Cameron + Co.

To quote DEFRA:

"The government believes that we need to protect the environment for future generations, make our economy more environmentally sustainable, and improve our quality of life and well-being. We also believe that much more needs to be done to support the farming industry, protect biodiversity and encourage sustainable food production."

Any support is of course, as always muchly appreciated :)
